title: New release info
message:
Twlikes 5.1.0 was released with lifetime plan.

Please download twlikes 5.1.0 from the App Store.

5.0.0.title: New release info
5.0.0.message:
Twlikes 5.1.0 was released with lifetime plan.

Please download twlikes 5.1.0 from the App Store.

5.1.0.title:
Twlikes 5.2.0 was released. I fixed the performance, memory usage and a session expiration bug in twlikes 5.2.0.

Please download twlikes 5.2.0 from the App Store.

5.4.1.title: Bug info
5.4.1.message: There is a bug that causes an error "UNIQUE constraint failed: users.id" on rare occasions. The bug was fixed in twlikes 5.4.2 and you can download it from the App Store.

5.4.2.title: Bug info
5.4.2.message:
There is a bug that causes the app to crash when opening the in-app purchase screen on iOS 9.

Could you please update the app to the latest version.

5.4.4.title: Bug info
5.4.4.message:
Twlikes 5.4.4 tried to fix "UNIQUE constraint failed: users.id" error, which happens on rare occasions, but failed.
I will investigate it again and fix it as soon as possible.
Thank you very much for your patience.

"Upload to iCloud" action for exporting has a bug which is causing the app to crash. The bug will be fixed in the next version.

5.4.9.title: Thank you and goodbye
5.4.9.message:
The twlikes app, which started under the name Likes, has been in service for over six years, but due to various changes at X (formerly Twitter), we have decided to end the service.
We would like to thank all of our users for their support, which has allowed us to continue until today. Thank you very much.
We will continue to provide the twlikes app for the time being as a way to view the likes you have already fetched.

6.0.0.title: Thank you and goodbye
6.0.0.message:
The twlikes app, which started under the name Likes, has been in service for over six years, but due to various changes at X (formerly Twitter), we have decided to end the service.
We would like to thank all of our users for their support, which has allowed us to continue until today. Thank you very much.
We will continue to provide the twlikes app for the time being as a way to view the likes you have already fetched.

I am going to leave the area of social networking for a while, dreaming of returning to it one day, as the situation with X and other social networking services is unpredictable. I am now trying to manage to start a project in a completely different genre. If you are interested, please tap 'Keep me updated' below.
